entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Sparwood

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries changing to 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries near noon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
